an1.61:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to skillful qualities, or makes unskillful qualities decline like arousing energy.
an1.61:1.2: When you’re energetic, skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities decline.”

an1.62:1.2: When you have many wishes, unskillful qualities arise and skillful qualities decline.”
